definition: want to stop but can't (idiom)/to be unable to stop oneself/to feel an urge to continue
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
(final particle, same as 吧)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
(negative prefix)/not/no
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
surname Neng

sentences.english: And uncontrolled playing can lead to other problems like debt.
sentences.chinese: 而因着欲罷不能，也導致了其他問題，有如負債等。

sentences.english: It combines wildness and gentleness so that you are unable to reject it at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 野性與柔美兼具一身，讓你在一眼就欲罷不能。

definition: leaving a rich aftertaste/(fig.) memorable/lingering in memory
to wish to continue sth/to have not fully expressed oneself
to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
incomparable/matchless
to love sth too much to part with it (idiom); to fondle admiringly
not simple/rather complicated/remarkable/marvelous
to expend a great deal of effort
hard to believe/incredible
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
to have guts/to have courage/to be brave
exquisite
to be dazzled
to be fired up (idiom)/to have one's blood racing
stunning/breathtaking
to exclaim in admiration/a gasp of surprise
(idiom) to gasp in amazement/to acclaim as the peak of perfection
